thread.title: Top 5 Indian Fine Dining Restaurants in Delhi
thread.title_full: Top 5 Indian Fine Dining Restaurants in Delhi

title: Top 5 Indian Fine Dining Restaurants in Delhi
text:
Top 5 Indian Fine Dining Restaurants in Delhi The Best of Fine Dining for Foodies in Delhi By Sharell Cook Updated June 01, 2016 . 
If you're a foodie who loves fine dining, Delhi is an excellent place to experience the best of Indian cuisine. From the traditional to the contemporary, it has many of the top restaurants in India. You wont regret trying these Delhi fine dining restaurants. Sheraton Hotels and Resorts 1. Bukhara 
Bukhara is probably the most famous restaurant in India. It's got an extensive string of awards to its name, and is consistently voted amongst the world's best restaurants. There's plenty of hype surrounding this restaurant, which has achieved cult status in the 25 years since it was opened, but it's not unjustified. Bukhara is known for its rustic atmosphere, open fronted kitchen, and delectable Northwest Frontier tandoori cuisine -- oh, and for the fact that US presidents Bill Clinton and Barack Obama have dined there. If you're interested in trying what they ate, ask for the special mixed meat Clinton Platter or Obama Platter. This restaurant is best suited to non-vegetarians. Be sure to make a reservation. Address: ITC Maurya Sheraton Hotel, Diplomatic Enclave, Sadar Patel Marg, New Delhi. Ph: (+91 11) 26112233. Opening Hours: 12.30 p.m. to 2.45 p.m. for lunch on weekends. 7.30 p.m. to 11.45 p.m. for dinner daily. 
continue reading below our video Tips for Taking Better Travel Photos Indian Accent 2. Indian Accent 
Indian Accent has taken the restaurant scene by storm and is the hottest restaurant in Delhi right now! Serving contemporary modern Indian cuisine by acclaimed chef Manish Mehrotra (who is often likened to a food god), it has decor to match. With room for just 45 guests, it provides an intimate dining experience at an intimate Delhi boutique hotel . To get the best of what's on offer, order the Chef's Tasting Menu consisting of 12 flawlessly executed dishes paired with wine. Address: The Manor, 77 Friends Colony West, New Delhi. Ph: (+91 11) 43235151. Opening Hours: Open daily from 12.00 p.m. to 3.00 p.m. for lunch, and 7.00 p.m. to 11.00 p.m. for dinner.
